author: Luke Schofield
comment: Used to work fine on my last phone but on my current one none of the tracking features work, it will display exactly where I've been but no other information (distance, time etc) it says I've done 0ft while the map shows I've travelled thousands of feet. absolutely no use in it's current state.

author: Frank D
comment: This app was my go to app for navigating between fishing points at sea. As my list of waypoints increased it was becoming increasingly tedious to select a way point from a list, until I realised there was a brilliant option to select way points via google maps. Unfortunately, using this option the app was randomly switching waypoints during navigation which was very annoying. Still a good app but unfortunately no longer for me.

author: vipin kt
comment: Not working in my phone (Oneplus 5) properly. Satelite in used in fix jumps to 0 abruptly. I fist thought it was gps issue. Then download gps test app and it worked fine. Contacted omeplus customer care and no problem was detected with my set.

author: sachin Patel
comment: I want to measure the distance I traveled in motorcycle. I keep the mobile in my pocket with the app running. But when I check after some time the mobile screen is off and the app stopped tracking speed and distance. I love this app and using since long time but this time I am frustrated because of this app. I suggest you to improve this app for running in background so that when mobile is locked, the app should still run and track speed in the background.

author: Peterson Thattil
comment: This was my favorite application a few years back. Now the dashboard is obstructing my screen and I don't find it that user friendly.

author: A Google User
comment: Used to be my go to app. Now I find it unusable Simply unreliable won't track walks keeps losing track of me and stopping.

author: Pheakdey Tang
comment: It is a helpful app. I love it. Still I have problem with camera, it does not focus, most of the time it gives a blur pic.

One of the best best app.i really loving app thank u very much.Add new option in menu screen i mean nearest waypoints(also add waypoints distance and bearing and course) this option is indian fishermen using.i standing boat i look the fish rock bottom already adding gps but gps show rock bottom waypoints and bearing and distance .waypoint bearing distance course this is one waypoint information 5 or 6 waypoints linly and bearing and distance.i saw the gps any angle had not rock point or rock point distance(in net lenght)

author: احمد صدیقی گیلانی
comment: Needs serious UI revamp + ability to save maps for offline usage (if it has it already, must clarify the setting).

author: Ines Andani
comment: I cant track my trip, everytime i start record playback the GPS location is off, so I have to pause it start again pause again and again.

author: Rio Wong
comment: Very slow responding app during operating for an imported GPX file, and chart shows nothing erroneously
Great app with tons of features and options. It will also work offline!

author: Captain Nino
comment: Its been very slow lately. Does it need an update?

author: Ali Zohaib
comment: No match for this app fantastic for offline use

author: Varik Valefor
comment: Other than crashing when zooming far into the playback map, this is nearly perfect.

author: Shatrughan Rai
comment: Update needed... Compass is not working.

author: कलाकार TALENT
comment: The best app sumit vidhate

author: Mahmoodh Mahey
comment: It's aasam

author: Anang Sahroni
comment: very good app, helps me a lot when i work in the field
SHANKAR CHAVAN hi

author: Michael Ward
comment: Really like the offline map feature.

author: r k
comment: Not work

author: Denis Bobrovskiy
comment: Excellent lightweight app for navigation

author: Abhirup Chaudhuri
comment: Great app for explorers

author: aazad ojha
comment: Need improvement in accuracy

author: Moe Zaw
comment: thanks

author: fathih al fathih
comment: ok

author: Myo Min Htun
comment: Very good

author: Pramod Gaonkar
comment: Nice

author: Thane Police serverroom
comment: Good

author: Lukas R
comment: This is a great App! I especially like that you can customize the dashboard.                                   I was wondering if there was a way to get directions using OSM vor OpenTopoMaps as a baselayer? If that works, I haven't found out how. Thanks!
title: Great

author: Andrew Finn
comment: For the past year different versions would either export or not export tracks to the point that it's really not reliable anymore to record a GPS track with this software when you may not be able to get to where you wanted it. Such a shame because for so many years this was the greatest piece of GPS tracking software ever found
title: Not reliable for exporting tracks

author: Blake Keyser
comment: This app is great! It does everything I need it to for a GPS.  The big issue is I go a lot of places and like to save the coordinates.  Twice now I opened the app to use it and found all my info that I had saved gone!  Most recently I lost over 2 years worth of saved locations.

author: Wyatt Leuck
comment: Nice app, and so far it is the best app like this yet. The UI feels clunky, and is awkward to figure out, and I wish I could download full maps because on the off chance that I didn't prescreen where I was going to have the ma cached, I'm kinda screwed. [maybe allow a base map download, and just catch higher zooms?]

author: Wayne Holmes
comment: As a software tester I can say from testing it that the functional side seems quite good but for usability it is one of the worst pieces of software I have ever used or tested. The PDF manual is not a great help and is a bit out of date. With  rework of the UI etc. it could be much better.

author: Randy Steck
comment: This app is extremely frustrating.  The user interface is far from intuitive.  I wanted to simply enter a GPS coordinate and then use the compass to guide me to it.  I was unable to find any way to simply enter the coordinates as a waypoint, let alone then activate it as the target for the compass.  I am dubious that anyone would actually find this confusing app that useful.

author: Scott Shearer
comment: A waste of time. Not fully functional or useful unless you pay.  Will it work? Who knows cause it sure as hell doesn't now!

author: Ali Raza
comment: Brilliant ,all in one. I was using this app since years in older android versions and had much worldwide location n stats saved but all lost as of device lost so why the coders not implement google my location in this app, but after all unique app in play store

author: Frank Nicoletti
comment: Compass will not move on my LG rebel or my xgody. What the problem is I have no idea. It worked great on my note 5

author: Alexander Ypema
comment: It often stops tracking in the background which kind of makes it utterly useless as GPS tracker, and gets reaaallllly laggy with larger tracks (25km with the car was plenty on my Xperia z5). Also can't edit my SmartWatch dash. It also would be nice to have an option to download a selected area so portable maps are /actually/ portable without manually having to scroll through the map at specific zoom levels to cache them. Would buy the app if it worked better, but for now I'll judge it as a free app.
title: Great concept but buggy at times
